sqls.sql: UPDATE sr_part_map_import_tmp SET sr_part_map_id = @sr_part_map_id, part_no = @part_no, supplier_no = @supplier_no, supplier_part_no = @supplier_part_no, supplier_part_name = @supplier_part_name, supplier_part_spec = @supplier_part_spec, supplier_part_brand = @supplier_part_brand, assign_proportion = @assign_proportion, purchase_qty_min = @purchase_qty_min, purchase_qty_add = @purchase_qty_add, purchase_lead_time = @purchase_lead_time, unit_price = @unit_price, price_currency = @price_currency, si_type = @si_type, si_degree = @si_degree, sr_part_map_rmk01 = @sr_part_map_rmk01, sr_part_map_rmk02 = @sr_part_map_rmk02, sr_part_map_rmk03 = @sr_part_map_rmk03, sr_part_map_rmk04 = @sr_part_map_rmk04, sr_part_map_rmk05 = @sr_part_map_rmk05, sr_part_map_rmk06 = @sr_part_map_rmk06, sr_part_map_rmk07 = @sr_part_map_rmk07, sr_part_map_rmk08 = @sr_part_map_rmk08, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host;
